## DurableOperation.sendCallbackSuccess() method

Sends a successful callback result to the durable execution service.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendCallbackSuccess(result?: string): Promise<SendDurableExecutionCallbackSuccessResponse>;
```

Promise&lt;SendDurableExecutionCallbackSuccessResponse&gt;

## Exceptions

Will throw an error if callback details are not available
